school_name: Valencia College - East and West Campus
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
stu_tags: EXTRA CREDIT  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Highly recommend this class if you are willing to put in the work. She assigns homework for each class, but they are easy assignments. Attendance is mandatory, so be there onetime and everyday unless excused. She gives lots of extra credit opportunities, so take advantage of them all. Study guides for test are provided and VERY useful. Pleasant.

school_name: Valencia College - East and West Campus
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Weekly lab quizzes, 2 lab practicals, tests every 2 weeks, final is comprehensive and I highly recommend finishing her study guides posted online before the exam. Tests usually cover 3-4 chapters; she just collects some random lab reports.

school_name: Valencia College - East and West Campus
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: She knows her stuff. Lecture style is a bit boring at times. Tries to spice up lectures with video clips and animations. Weekly lab quizzes, lowest dropped. 3 tests, lowest dropped. Cumulative final. 90% of the labs are awful, but I blame the curriculum, not her. She didn\'t write the lab manual. Always answered student questions reasonably.

school_name: Valencia College - East and West Campus
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: BORING!! And the test are really hard. Tried to drop but she told me not,so I failed!! Doesn\'t answer any questions straight.

school_name: Valencia College - East and West Campus
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: She is so BORING. Her class is easy, but she\'ll put you to sleep. And she\'s horrible at answering questions.

school_name: Valencia College - East and West Campus
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: This class...*which was supposed to be fairly simple* to me was not...she tried cramming in her regular fall/spring curriculum which made this summer class difficult. Furhtermore, the tests were not that hard nonetheless you really didn\'t know what they would be on...no study guides were ever provided...bottom line I would not take this lady again!

school_name: Valencia College - East and West Campus
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Listen BORING is the key word of this class... wouldn\'t take her again at all... she just made everything boring and talks so much and DON\'T ask her a question because she beats around the bush...

school_name: Valencia College - East and West Campus
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Overall easy class. Teacher is really nice, lets you txt, use computer, sleep. Labs are very easy, dont do much of anything. Simple lab quiz at beginning of every class. Test are not hard if you study usually 2 chapters. Class can be extremely boring during lecture. One page report for extra credit.

school_name: Valencia College - East and West Campus
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: The class was an easy A. She did seem like she may have been an elementary teacher. she didn\'t have much control over the class. but her class was easy easy easy. i thought i hated biology before this class, but i was pretty interested. she is overall a sweet teacher and she will be much more willing to help you if she sees that you are trying

school_name: Valencia College - East and West Campus
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Nice person, lazy teacher. Never let us learn from what we got wrong, was behind on lectures to labs so we got tested on things we hadn\'t learned. Never knew the answer when someone asked a question, never offered to find out. Lecture style tedious, always seemed unprepared, said "um" all the time. Don\'t take!!

school_name: Valencia College - East and West Campus
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Ms. Shipman was nice and when I asked what would be on the final she was very general but informed me that it wouldnt be as specific as the other tests. If you take this class get ready to write a crap load of notes. Lecture time was all note taking which can get very boring. It is hard to miss any class because there are so many notes and you have

school_name: Valencia College - East and West Campus
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Class is not a walk in the park, but Prof Shipman tries to make it easier. You have to write down her PPTs if you want the info. M/C tests, weekly lab quizzes. Drops worst test and quiz. You need to show up, pay attention, and study if you want to do well. Does talk to class as if we were kids, but holds you responsible for your work.

school_name: Valencia College - East and West Campus
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Class wasn\'t to hard if your interested in the material, if not, she\'s kind of boring. Seems like she may have been an elementary teacher in the past, explains assignments as if you were a 6 year old. Labs are fairly interesting, again if you can handle being spoken to like a child. Overall an easy A if you like BIO if not find a more exciting prof
